} } } Length:: 5:52 MinsThe Gtab is a great overall package for what it comes with. For under $300 and far less than the price of the newest iPad model, you get a crystal clear, 10-inch HD display, customizable Android OS, and a super-smooth quad core processor all packed in a light, compact tablet PC.The first thing I noticed was the simplicity of the package contents and packaging design. With what came in the box, it was super easy to break out and get going right away. Also you get a wall charger as well as a micro USB cable which makes powering this thing really convenient. With the exception of the primary charging input and headphone output, all ports on the tablet are located in one area and are protected with a very handy dust shield, which looks pretty sturdy compared to other designs I've seen. It also comes with a neat micro-SD slot, which is handy for data transfer up to 32 GB at a time. The external speaker is also a great feature for showing video clips and video chat.The feature most worth mentioning is the awesome HD display, since I work in marketing and was looking for a way to give one-on-one, quality presentations on the fly. I downloaded a very useful office suite app and can not only view presentations, but also spreadsheets and documents as well.All in all I'd say you're getting a great deal given the price point combined with the quality HD display and it's uses. I'm definitely happy with it!

Reviews.Title: A very good value; a very good android tablet.
Reviews.Author: JMat
Reviews.Content: This is a very good general android tablet and I give it 4 stars mostly because of its exceptional value,although, its technical offerings, with a few exceptions, are very good. It is a beautiful white tablet with a very small bezel edge. It is listed as a 10.1 in. screen sized tablet but that only refers to the diagonal measurement of the screen. Its actual size from edge to edge is 7"x10" so be careful when you buy a case for it.The G-Tab allows you to carry out the same functions as many other much more expensive tablets do with the same kind of ease. The graphics are very clear and fairly sharp thanks to its Mali400 High Performance 3D Gaming GPU . It is fast and most importantly it is very stable. The A31s Allwinner  Quad Core CPU  really does this tablet justice. Except for the camera (which seems to have been made not for picture taking but for webcam use and perhaps document imaging) and the minor ports location design quibbles, I found that all its listed functions do perform well. I mean who uses a tablet's camera to take pictures. The tablet is also `rooted' which means that you will be able to install apps that only work with a rooted android device. That would be,for example, apps such as the firewalls in Avast and Comodo's security software. Firewalls only truly work with rooted devices. I bought one tablet as a gift for my nephew and while setting it up for him, I put it through the wringer testing all its capabilities and it held up through all my abuse beautifully. I was so impressed by the value and function provided by a tablet at this price range that I ordered me a second one. Of course, I am referring to the $197 price range that I bought it for. I ordered my second one on January 3, 2014 for $197.Now, my friend that is good value. Right now,right after I made this last purchase, the price went up and Matricom is selling it at the $299 Plus 10.77 shipping price at amazon.com. I guess that the good reviews have gone to Matricom's head. At that price, you might as well start considering other more stable tablet options from Samsung, google, et al. And by stable, I mean tablets that have the possibility of future support for updates of the operating system. If you go to their supplier <quantum supplier> you will see no sign of future support for this tablet but then you have to balance that out by the one year defective hardware warranty that they promise.Now, it is not a perfect tablet but it is very good where it counts. Where this tablet will fall short for some people-I mean some people- is in its flash storage capacity. Eight gigs of storage with three for system resources and  for storing applications from google's play store and 5gigs for your photos, music, vids, etc. is not enough storage for people that install a lot of apps, especially games. When you download apps from the play store they are automatically installed into the three gigs system partition and considering that this tablet does not make it easy for you to move them to the second partition of the internal flash memory you will need to do something to avoid insufficient storage problems. Don't forget that if you just buy an external microSD flash card and just pop it into the unit that the only thing that you will be able to use it for is to store your music, videos, and documents but not to install your apps. For most people, that will not be a problem.So, here is a solution for those of you who will be bothered when your tablet tells you that it cannot install an app because of insufficient storage:1. Buy a flash card (30gigs, class 10 would be good) from amazon.com and use it to store your music, pics, vids, etc.2.  Go to the google play store and download the free utitily "move Apps (Apps 2 SD)" and move all the movable apps to SD partition of the tablet. That would be the 5gigs second internal partition.3.Don't use the tablet without buying the microSD card suggested above or you might run into the "out of storage" problem as you start to install more apps from the play store.

} } } Length:: 4:53 MinsThe gtab is an excellent product. I was originally going to get an ipad but I found this on amazon for 249.99 so I purchased it so save some money. I was very surprised that when I got the product at how easily it is to use. The display is a 10-inch hd and is crystal clear and is very light tablet. It is very customizable to the things that you need. Its design seems to be very durable as well and has a great battery life. The reason I chose to purchase a tablet is for school, net surfing, Netflix watching, and composing short documents for work. Within the first twenty four hours I found myself completely addicted to this tablet and wondering how I'd ever managed life without it. The graphics and sound quality are excellent for the price and it is extremely easy to set up and use. I enjoyed being able to listen to music while at work and school, getting instant email and Facebook updates. I've played around on friends' Ipads before and personally find this much easier to use the keyboard is easier to type on and I find it easier to scroll while browsing the internet. I also like that it had the dual cameras which makes skyping and taking pictures even easier.Overall this is a great tablet and worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Not bad.
Reviews.Author: Undertone tire
Reviews.Content: Coming from an Ipad (first Gen) i was expecting something similar, well, not built as well for sure. Now saying that, being more of an Android fan than IOS, i love the Jelly Bean. My phone is Ice Cream Sandwich, so there were some minor differences. The tablet is faster than the old Ipad, has more of a wide screen format, has 2 cameras, USB, HDMI, and the Micro SD slot. These continue to be my biggest complaint with Apple not providing these minor additions(other than the camera on newer models). I agree with others, the camera is marginal, the 720P video recording function is a little choppy. Works well enough for Skype etc. I was able to plug in a Micro USB charger, and it seems to be able to charge through that, time will tell. The standard charger is a pin type power connector, this one thing drops my overall score a bit. The back is aluminum, and the build quality is pretty good for a sub-$200 tablet. The display is pretty sharp, colors look ok. Not higher end tablet quality, but usable for sure. The touch is responsive, and pages scroll very well. Comes with flash installed, but needs a third party browser to enable it. I use dolphin or Firefox, both work well with the flash once you enable the plug in. For those that care, it WILL connect to the ELM327 Bluetooth and run Torque for OBD2 diagnostics. I would have given 4 1/2 stars if i could, but its not 5. I will update my review in a week or so if anything changes. Update: working well, however 2 issues. Time doesn't seem correct unless you manually set it, and ive tried allowing mock locations and not. SD card memory doesn't seem to display correctly in settings. Also, this is MICRO usb, not Mini. No big deal there.Pros:Jelly Bean 4.2.2SpeedFlash playerPlay store compatible (not all tablets are out of the box)Screen resolution (for a sub-200 tablet)HDMI, USB, and M-SD slotRooted out of the boxNeutrals:Front cameraBuild quality. (slot cover could have been better)WiFi rangeNegatives:Battery charger port (should have been Micro USB, like everything else)Rear cameraMemory card does not show Free and Used memory correctly.

Reviews.Title: update: wifi droping returned
Reviews.Author: Rudy S
Reviews.Content: After reading all the great reviews I decided to get this bad boy. the tablet looks, beautiful the build quality is great white color look really nice in person. The ten inch led lps HD screen is crisp and has a 178° viewing angle(there is a protective clear plastic cover on screen if taken off its much more vivid and clearer u cant even tell is there.) plus there is a HDMI mini plug to connect to TV. the quad core chip set by all winner keep the tablet running smoothly.now let's talk about the operating system running on jellybean 4.2 .2, it is rooted out the box all you have to do is go on the Play Store and get this app called superuser which lets you download and install rooted app, its free and easy(its like jail breaking for android. Android rooting is the process of allowing users of smartphones, tablets, and other devices running the Android mobile operating system to attain privileged control (known as "root access") within Android's subsystem.Rooting is often performed with the goal of overcoming limitations that carriers and hardware manufacturers put on some devices, resulting in the ability to alter or replace system applications and settings, run specialized apps that require administrator-level permissions, or perform other operations that are otherwise inaccessible to a normal Android user.). the battery life is good about 6 hours they say I'm getting about that if not more on regular use. there is wifi and Bluetooth but no internal GPS. the bottom line for a tablet for under $200 HD 10.1 inch with quad-core micro SD slot mini HDMI dual camera its light 1.4 lbs don't hesitate the tablet speaks for itself and everyone agrees pick one up you won't be disappointed, I'm glad I did.Update: WiFi drops constantly, returned it

Reviews.Title: Well' sometimes you get more than you pay for!
Reviews.Author: Fwayne
Reviews.Content: I'm just stunned.  I got this for my wife as a birthday gift.  I would have been happy if it just letHer use Facebook and Pandora, buy its so much better than that.  This is a no brainer. At this price you can't go wrong. Video is crisp. Internet browsing perfect. Apps run flawlessly. Loaded with most current android.Some slight concerns are the little dust cover for the expansion ports. No issue yet but its a bit flimsy. Camera says 3MP. I don't see that its that high but not too bad.I'm buying one for myself!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for a great price.
Reviews.Author: Mostly textbooks
Reviews.Content: I've had this tablet for a month now and I have used it nearly every day so I feel like I can give a solid, honest review. I did quite a bit of research before I bought this, both on and off of Amazon and felt confident that I was making a good choice for the money. I use this mostly for school, e-mail, surfing the net and watching You Tube videos and Movies. Ok, so straight out of the box the unit feels solid and well made. The buttons on the side are self explanatory so it was easy to see where to charge it, and to turn it on. While others have negatively commented on the door that hides the USB, micro USB, and memory card slot, I have no problems opening or closing it and it's as sturdy as any others that I have encountered on other electronics.When I hit the power button the G-tab powered on in seconds.It is fast and responsive to the touch, downloads everything I've needed quickly and with no issues, including proprietary school documents. Everything works the way it is supposed to, the battery usually lasts 6-9 hours depending on what I'm doing. The only issue's that I have experienced are that the camera's take grainy pictures, but I didn't get this tablet for the camera and the speakers could be louder, also not an issue for me because I normally use headphones.This is a great tablet and much cheaper than anything comparable. I ordered a keyboard case for my G-tab (also here on Amazon) and after a month of solid use I still love it. I hope this review helps others ;)  P.S. I decided to update because I've had this for over 7 months now. I still love this tablet! I use it everyday to write papers for school and prefer it to my laptop. I take it with me everywhere I go and I continue to recommend this tablet to anyone I know. This is a quality product and I'm really glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for a great price! HD picture, fast, I having no negatives to report.
Reviews.Author: John Ratchford ""war baby""
Reviews.Content: I have a Nexus 7, and purchased this for the larger screen, except for the screen size, no differenceFor the price, it's a great tablet, highly recommend it, oh! the battery life is amazing, I get about 10 hour souse, before needing to recharge.

Reviews.Title: Solid tablet at a BARGAIN price.  Great sound. Has latest Android Jelly Bean 4.2.2 OS
Reviews.Author: ehahnda

} } } Length:: 8:53 MinsMatricom's G-tab Quantum HD is more than capable of rivaling other tablets out there with a 10.1'' screen (1280x800)resolution at a bargain price. I personally spend so much time YouTubing for musical performances from Late Night television shows, streaming concerts from across the world and catching up on morning sports debates and ESPN highlights that I may not have time for in the early mornings or late nights. Watching Netflix and Hulu Plus on this HD screen is a joy. It is a excellent tool for social networking and it provides easy access to Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and video chatting with friends and family on Skype or any other application downloadable through the packaged Google Play Store. I particularly like the sound of the keypad as it clicks with a crisp feedback when you type on the keypad or click on an application. The only discrepancy I have is that I wish the front face camera had a higher megapixel count but I have had no problems video chatting with anyone nor did they have trouble viewing my face. For the Gamers and online internet radio music streamers, this would make a fine investment for those that love listening to tunes through Pandora, Spotify, and playing Angry Birds. The sound is exquisite and the colors are quite vibrant as you can multitask applications to accommodate your busy day. Already 8GB standard memory but conveniently expandable up to 32 GB through a micro SD card expansion. I'm quite satisfied with this buy! 5 stars for the pricing.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet but I question the production QC process
Reviews.Author: Dale A. Nesty
Reviews.Content: To date I have purchased 3 of these tablets , in January I purchased 2 (tablet 1 and tablet 2) but I had to return  Tablet1 because the screen was acting up and it was jittering and it seemed like it was constantly being tapped in a particular area , this would happen randomly making the tablet useless and creating a frustrating experience. Tablet 2 worked perfectly and to date I am very satisfied with its performance , battery life and overall experience. So I returned tablet 1 and purchased Tablet 3.Tablet 3 had a flawless screen  but its Wifi connection speed was considerably less than tablet 2 . with every test I did , OKLA speed test, YouTube downloads , movie downloads , switching positions of the tablet .. It made no difference tablet 2 always demonstrated a faster download speed. I have checked all the settings and both tablets have the exact same android version , firmware version , kernel version and Build number. Given that this tablet will be used mainly for media viewing if I cannot figure why tablet 3 is so slow I will definitely be returning it. It seams like they may have at some point swapped out internals . So to sum it up , this is a great tablet if you get one that was built properly and has its WiFi internals are configured correctly . if I figure out how to improve the download WiFi  speed I'll update this post.To date I have reset and reflashed my matricom tablet and the download speeds on tablet 3 is still about half of that on tablet 2 . It looks to me that someone in the finance department decided to go with a cheaper part to save a few pennies and messed up a perfectly great product. I think I will be returning tablet 3 and ordering another one hoping that I get one from the good production run.http://youtu.be/aOdy4bEc9AY

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Sandy Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: So far the G-Tab has been everything I could want: fast, responsive and easy to use. If you have any familiarity with android products the latest Jelly Bean OS will be a breeze. While I use my tab primarily as a reader, it meets all my needs as a full fledged tablet. Comes preloaded with all the most popular apps ( and fully charged out of the box to boot) and carries a one year manufactures warranty. And battery life is much better than my previous Asus Transformer tablet. The screen is very bright and responsive.So unless you need the prestige of a big brand name, for under $200 this G-Tab Quantum is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS TAB. A sweet treat!!! lol
Reviews.Author: Toni-Ann Clarke
Reviews.Content: I received it and I can honestly say I was afraid and was ready to wait till I could afford something else. I will always be a android customer and didn't even think about the ipad but I had my eye on The Samsung Tab 3. Well, Obviously I took a leap and I am very glad I took it. This Tab is really wonderful, very neat, very fast, WIFI works great for me and its the screen is great. It was a treat to myself for Christmas & boy was it sweet. I really appreciate this tablet. Also, did you see the price. & the battery is great. BUY IT. You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Quite a good stock Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Thomas C. Nowak
Reviews.Content: This tablet is better than I had expected for the price. I assumed that this was simply one of the many clones built in China or somewhere else in the Far East by a small manufacturer. Perhaps so, but Quantum did quite a decent job. The IPS screen is reasonably responsive and while the 1280 by 800 resolution is not state of the art, it is good. While 8 gig of memory can be quite limiting, Android is very efficient and one can load a number of Android apps on the tablet. The tablet comes with Flash installed (for Android 4.2) and one can play flash videos (for example from the NBC web site) by activating the flash plugin in some browser such as Firefox. You can also add a microsd card and use the card to move apps from the tablet to the sd card. This helps the user overcome some of the limits of only 8 gigs of memory. The tablet appears to be fairly stock Android, and the user has full use of the Android Play store. The system does not recognize the proper amount of memory on the flash memory card, but I will keep filling it with apps and media until I get a "full" message. Audio is okay, screen refreshes are obviously not as fast as on the latest Samsung Note 10.1 or the iPad Air, but decent. The battery life appears to be good, but the charger is not microusb, so don't lose it. I have used the tablet for 4 days, and so far so good. Time will tell if it is durable.

Reviews.Title: Great affordable 10" tablet
Reviews.Author: Wess Wallace IV
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for the price. This tablet has bluetooth, HD screen, HDMI output to connet to a HD TV, looks beautiful, bluetooth keyboard works great with the tablet, has android 4.2.2 (jelly bean) , over all its a great tablet. If your looking for a affordable tablet for school, work, or just because you should buy this G-Tab Quantum 10" tablet!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great bang for your buck - just don't listen to Amazon; wrong specs for this tablet.
Reviews.Author: Psalmopoeus
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic tablet for the money. However, Amazon really screwed up on the description of this item. In the description it claims to take a mini USB port, which is NOT true. It takes a MICRO USB. Because of that, the two cases with built-in keyboards that I ordered for myself and my fiancé will have to be returned, because it's painfully obvious that a mini USB plug will not fit into a micro USB port. My advice to any buyer is to wait until they get the item and then purchase a case or keyboard for this tablet. Don't take Amazon's word for the specs like I did. Wait until you've got the item in your hands and can see for yourself what accessories and plugs will fit.Back to the tablet though... this tablet is great. Moderate use of apps and emails and other online activity, I'm getting at least 12 hours right now from the battery. I received this two days ago, so it's been going through some testing. I have a tendency to turn off any vibration or haptic feedback since it drives me crazy, so I am sure that's saving some battery life.I'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a great bang for their buck, anyone who's looking for a first tablet, or for someone who needs the portability of a laptop but doesn't have the funds for one.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet !!!
Reviews.Author: John Sindeldecker "Busman37"
Reviews.Content: This is one of the nicest tablets I have ever used. It is quick and easy to use and battery lasts a long time. A definite great buy for the money !!!

Reviews.Title: More than impressed
Reviews.Author: Kris Bright
Reviews.Content: This tablet is pretty darn amazing. My coworker has the Galaxy tab 3 and not only is this G-tab faster it also has a nicer screen. Not to mention its over $100 less! Its perfect for just about everything I've tried on it. Games run smooth as silk on this thing! Movies play flawless. I really cant get over this screen. Its beautiful and bright. My only dislike is the dust shield is inconvenient if you access your USB ports a lot. Other than that if you put this tablet next to the samsung tablets and you'll choose this one instead every time. I know what I'm buying everybody for Christmas this year.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value!
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: I've been using this tablet for a couple days now and so I'm ready to post my initial thoughts.Here's the good:1.  The aluminum case makes it feel very solid and well-built2.  Battery life is fantastic3.  VERY fast and responsive4.  Can't beat the price5.  Starts up from full power down in less than 30 seconds.  Starts up immediatley from standby.The bad:1.  Sound is pretty weak.  The manufacturer should have put the speaker in the front instead of the back.  It's fine if you're alone, but when my family is talking in the room it's hard to hear the sound on the tablet.2.  The cameras aren't great, but fine for basic video chatting and pictures.  Maybe I'm spoiled with the camera on my iPhone 5.3.  I wish a mini-HDMI-to-HDMI cable had been includedEven with the weak sound and camera, I still gave it 5 stars because of the performance and price.  I shopped around for a tablet for a couple months before purchasing this one.  I'm confident I made the right choice.  I would definitely buy this tablet again.

Reviews.Title: The wifi works when it wants to.. who needs that garbage?
Reviews.Author: miss-honesty "Tiffany"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this mid-December in time for Christmas for my mother. She lugs around the laptop and was having trouble carrying it. Her computing needs could be covered by this tablet so I purchased it. For under two hundred dollars, the reviews looked favorable enough I decided on this relatively unknown brand. Her eyes aren't that good so I needed to get her the ten inch tablet versus a seven inch one. It's unfortunate because for that same money a good brand could have been procured in 7''.At first, I was pleased with myself. She loved it. The HD display is nice, the weight is on point and it did everything she needed it to do. The camera has a very low resolution and that was initially all I disliked about it. Now it is hardly February and she's having wireless issues. Mainly, the internet will work on one day and not on another. How is she supposed to cope with that? I've tried working it upstairs, and downstairs when it's within several feet of the router. This router can operate two laptops and a phone without problems. I tried using this tablet with ONLY the Matricom requesting internet. No dice. I just looked into my orders to return it thinking I'd try out another tablet to see if this was merely some hardware fault in her particular one. My window expired TWO days ago. I now plan on buying a more reliable brand like Asus or Samsung and I'll be the proud owner of this secondhand paperweight. Thanks, Matricom. I'll remember that I shouldn't roll the dice on electronics.My advice? Stick to a brand you've already tried and found to be true. The knock-offs can really burn you. This is by far my worst purchase in years of Amazon. I'd better go get some ICE for this BURN.

Reviews.Title: Beast of a tablet!
Reviews.Author: Mandatory345
Reviews.Content: This tablet is powerful. Fastest I have ever seen. Games run awesome on it. There's only a couple of things I don't particularly like:1) Dust cover is flimsy feeling but is actually really strong (the rubber holding it on is)2) Wi-fi distance is sub-par. I cant venture too far out of the house with it. I think its because of the aluminum case.The things I do like:1) Screen is simply beautiful. Very sharp. I guess because of the IPS technology2) Touch is very accurate. I have had many tablets in the past. This one has a good touch sensor.3) Processing power is unmatched by anything I have ever used. Faster than probably anything else out there.4) Android 4.2.2 loaded. I see many tablets have older version of Android. This one is pretty up-to-date5) VERY responsive. zero lag. It gets things done quickly.6) Bluetooth works great and has good distance. Streams music to car stereo perfectly7) Play store works perfect8) 4K player is badass. Can watch movie on TV through HDMI and still use tablet. Dual display. AWESOME!9) Backed by a good warranty. 1yr from matricom, I feel good about this purchase without worrying about it breaking.This tablet is worth far more than what they're selling it for. The Samsung Galaxy 3 is slower and is over $100 more expensive.

Reviews.Title: Highly Impressed
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I looked at quite a few tablets before deciding to buy the G-Tab and the selling point for me was the size and the price. When I opened the box and fired it up it was fully charged and best of all it didn't look like a cheap tablet. There is only one speaker so the tablet isn't very loud but I use headphones so it wasn't a big deal. It doesn't come preloaded with apps I'll never use so I was able to customize it the way I wanted to. Screen looksImpressive which means if you watch movies on your tablet you'll be blown away.The table this very easy to use and was able to navigate through the screens and options quickly and easily with zero difficulty.  Granted there is limited memory but that's why it has expandable memory. You can pop in an SD card and boost it. I have no idea how the camera looks because I use my cell phone and have no need to use the camera on my tablet. The one issue everyone seems to have is the Wi-Fi but I had no issues there at all. Granted, this was just in house but at some point I'll take this out to test it further.  I have only had the tablet for a day but so far I'm impressed. It may be priced low but for what it offeres it doesn't feel like a cheap tablet. For those who are looking for a tablet that fits into a budget go with the G-Tab and you won't be dissapointed. I have had no problems and recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Really good tablet at a low price
Reviews.Author: Tyler Mulligan
Reviews.Content: Running Android 4.2.2 without too much added junk ware. Very smooth and interoperatable. Easy to get started, stream off your local network or it looks like ever some cellular networks. The box was simple, a bit Apple esque. I was impressed by my dual core processes by comparison. I haven't intensely tested benchmarks in game but running the basics, it's self-explanitory and I love the extra hook-ups. Google Play Store integration is nice, doesn't require using other sites or services for apk (apps).I haven't played enough but comparing to a few other Android devices, I'm happy with my purchase. Can't wait to see what else this one can do. Will edit my review as I learn more.

Reviews.Title: Won't boot up. Horrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Paul Howe
Reviews.Content: My gtab worked fine for a few days then started getting locked up on the android screen. I tried a couple of "fixes" that customer service recommended, but no luck. I paid for shipping to send it back to customer service. They sent me back the same device with the same issue as when I sent it in. I'm not even sure that they looked at it. Again I contacted Matricom and told them that I was having the same problem. They said that if I sent it in, they would send me a new device. I shipped the device back for a second time. After complaining about how long it was taking to send me a device they finally sent me something. Guess what... It was the same box and  the same tablet that I had sent in with the same issue. I am now requesting that they refund my money. They have been terrible to deal with and completely unresponsive. They told me that they were replacing the device with a new one and they sent me back the same broken device. I wonder what lies they are going to tell me next...

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: D. Villarreal "dvmarie"
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying that I'm pretty easy to please overall.  I have always purchased Apple for my mobile devices, but I really couldn't justify the expense of an iPad.  I primarily want a tablet for reading books at night, cruising the internet, and jotting down ideas. I may end up watching movies/TV on this (right now I watch on my iPhone).  I suppose my long relationship with Apple might make me someone with high performance expectations..... not sure.  Anyway, I honestly braced myself to be disappointed by this tablet since it was so affordable.  Didn't happen.  I am very pleased overall.What I like;How affordable it isit is not "cheap" feeling - it feels substantial without being too heavySo far all the apps I've downloaded are working flawlessly (especially the reading app)What is not all that great:The camera isn't very good.  It's not HORRIBLE, but it's not great either.  This matters not at all to me since I use my iPhone, which has a flash, to take pictures with.  If it's important that you have an upscale camera feature - this unit might not be for you.Occasionally the touch screen doesn't respond the first time a selection is made. I found this on the far left of the screen usually.  I'm a patient person, so this really doesn't drive me crazy.  Especially since it happens only in very limited circumstances, and it's easy to work around it.  If you are a gamer it might matter to you.Overall - I'm pleased with this purchase, and I look forward to finding lots of ways to use my new tablet.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Issue!!
Reviews.Author: yukon sunrise
Reviews.Content: We received this item yesterday from a seller on ebay.  We really like it.  But there are serious issues with wireless connectivity.  This morning we contacted Matricom about the issues and they said they are aware of it and trying to work with the manufacturer about updating the firmware or changing the antenna design.  But have no estimate on when or if this will happen. At 30 feet, line of sight, no metal obstructions, we get only 2 bars and the internet is extremely slow.  Anything under 4 bars doesn't seem to work well.  We also tried it on another router/different channel with the same results.  THIS PRODUCT SHOULD NOT BE SOLD AT THIS TIME WITH KNOWN WIRELESS ISSUES.  If this were not an issue, this appears to be a great product.  This is a tablet, wireless is essential. Disappointed that we have this issue and need to return it.

Reviews.Title: dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This would be a good tablet except that you have to be sitting on top of your router for it to work

Reviews.Title: Great Performance For The Money - Better Than Expected
Reviews.Author: John-Eric Booth "JohnEricBooth"
Reviews.Content: Upon receiving my new Matricom G-Tab, I was impressed with the nice packaging (good start). The unit has a nice feel to it... not so "plastic" and toy-like. SOLID. The pushbuttons and connectors seem decent quality too. For $188.00 you really can't beat it.I am a little confused about the specs stating the unit has 8GB of storage. My G-Tab reports a total storage space of 4.24GB (not to be confused with "available" space) so perhaps I am misunderstanding something here. I realize Android needs about 1GB.It's a speedy device considering the specs. Battery life is quite nice too.The video quality is impressive (again, this is a $188 unit) and all in all I see this unit being great for air travel (movies, music, my pinball app) and downtime in airports.I tried to pair it via bluetooth with my Oontz Angle bluetooth speaker but it just wasn't finding it. I'm a little unclear with this issue... since the speaker and my Samsung Galaxy paired perfectly.I think you'll be pleased with this. Purchase an additional micro SD flash memory for about $16 on eBay and you'll be all set!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet with a few flaws
Reviews.Author: Bernard Adams
Reviews.Content: Only had it a few days, fast, never seen a tablet start as fast as this one. Great picture, smooth scrolling, very responsive, I would give it 5stars but the sound is weak and the antenna is not as strong as my other 3 tablets. Do I like this tablet, you bet

Reviews.Title: Wi-Fi ISSUE, NOT LUCK
Reviews.Author: Prof men "WORLD  MEN"
Reviews.Content: WiFi issue in this unit, bad WiFi Connection, short range, i contact the seller, to exchange the unit. Seller told me, send it back to me,  i say not problem. After week and half seller sent me back the G-TAB Back to me. Hes sent me back to me the G-TAB without box protection, !!!OMG!!!! You know how many hundreds of box was over the G-Tab unit that was traveling from Orlando Florida until California USA? Truck over truck from 6 day of traveling?. I can not still believe what Matricom customer service did that, to send the G-tab without box protection?, i remember that when i sent the box back to them, i put the same box that Amazon sent me to protect the unit, but they sent me the unit without box protection, i prefer to have the first unit with Wifi issue, then have this last unit with a lot hit and scratches over,,,. ----WASTE TIME AND MONEY-----

Reviews.Title: MATRICOM TABLET EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: lEO mERCIER
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THE TABLET, THE PRICE AND THE TIMELY SHIPMENT. WOULD DEFINETLY BUY AGAIN. I WAS IMPRESSED WITH THE QUALITY OF THE OF THE PRODUCT, FOR THE PRICE

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Britney Alexander
Reviews.Content: After spending a lot of time reviewing tablets I found this one. I'm glad that I purchased this and not a tablet that all the box stores recommended. Not to mention the chain stores that recommended other brands. I have had absolutely no problems with this tablet. It performs flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Great Device for the price!
Reviews.Author: warriormom
Reviews.Content: Awesome device; easy to set up and easy to use.  Bought it for my husband who is technology challenged and even he loves it!  Great price and just as powerful as any 3-400 dollar tablet!  Perfect present!

Reviews.Title: Matricom G_Tab
Reviews.Author: Betty Ross
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet! Everyone kept telling me not to buy this brand because it was not a brand name, but, I love this tablet, it is perfect for what I need it for, the only draw back is I wish their were more original accessories for it, but, other then that I would recommend this 100%, you won't regret buying this tablet, great buy.

Reviews.Title: Best buy out there.
Reviews.Author: Parke Heller
Reviews.Content: This tablet is is great.  Was looking for a way for my wife to use the internet when she was sick & not have to move her tablet around with her.  Has all the features of a more expensive tablet that our friends have but for 1/2 the price.  Such a good product we bought 2.  The customer support of this company is 2nd to none.  Buy with confidence.

Reviews.Title: I loved it.
Reviews.Author: Jason B.
Reviews.Content: I love this unit. Particularly the price that I paid when it was in sale.I will recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: cahern67
Reviews.Content: So glad i made the switch from a 7"  tablet to this larger one.  Fully functional and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: great choice
Reviews.Author: zebsgirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet after choosing the noria expanse 10 in which crapped out on me in the first three days. I am so happy with my new tablet! The picture can be seen from almost any angle and the resolution is awesome. I love this tablet well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: One of my better purchases
Reviews.Author: Conrad Modeste
Reviews.Content: Really did my home work on this tablet and I must say that it didn't disappoint. It was fully charged right out of the box, WiFi works great anywhere in the house. It's a fast and  easy to use. The build quality is outstanding I would definitely recommend this tablet to anyone who is looking for a iPad alternative.

Reviews.Title: Decent tablet
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas.  First things, it does what it's suppose to.  It connects to the internet, plays games, etc.  It does it pretty well, though I've seen some lag time.  The biggest drawback is the sound.  It is not loud at all.  In fact, we had the volume full blast and had a lot of difficulty listening to the videos we were playing.Still, it's a lot a fun, and playing with it, I want to get one for myself now.  Nice toy.

Reviews.Title: Matricom G-Tab is awesome! Best deal out there for tablets!
Reviews.Author: JimboPA1
Reviews.Content: Got 2 of these for our daughters for Christmas. I wanted a tablet that was going to be solid and fast. Not cheaply made and slower than all heck. I had a cheap 8" tablet before and it was better off going in the trash. These tablets have been working great so far! No issue's with the wifi like some others had. I went to each end my house and even pick up signal when I go outside from the house a little. Tablet feel like it is good quality, it runs fast and the touchscreen feels good! Camera isn't the greatest but it's still nice. For the price this is a must have Android tablet. I will update if I do encounter any issues later on.And oh yes a question maybe someone can answer for me. I ordered cases with built in keyboards for these 2 tablets but when they came the keyboards were busted. Which is good cause after getting them these cases seem really cheap so I am sending them back. Anyone had luck with a keyboard case for these tablets? Please share because I need to get 2 of them!Thanks!

Reviews.Title: The Best for my Money!
Reviews.Author: Sugar Magnolia
Reviews.Content: I seriously love this tablet. After a series of unfortunate cheapies, this is lovely. It's nice sized, good priced, fast, just perfect for what I need. I would however suggest to the ones assembling this tablet, leave the protective cover off, because dude clearly had his eye closed on this step. Just leave a new one for us to put on, ourselves, that way if we screw it up, we only cuss our self and not you.I would really like two replacement screens. Other than that, not one issue with this gem. Long battery life too!!

Reviews.Title: Very nice!!
Reviews.Author: Russell Moffett
Reviews.Content: I was a little worried because of some reviews mentioned a WiFi problem. I experienced no problems at all, works nicely anywhere in the house. Excellent tablet for the price.

Reviews.Title: Big Bang for the Buck
Reviews.Author: Sully
Reviews.Content: Fast and responsive! This tablet uses the Android Operating System to its full extent! The price is just icing on the cake.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet and amazing price.
Reviews.Author: SWhite
Reviews.Content: Good tablet and amazing price.I was consiering buying the galaxy tab 10 but ended up with this instead. Very happy with this decision. The price is perfect and the tablet works as expected. Had it for a few months now and still works as good as the day I got it. Im getting another as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Corry E. Sheely
Reviews.Content: I had problems with the tablet at first but Matricom helped resolve the issue. Turns out it wasn't the tablet it was it's failure to connect with WiFi in the house. That was a Century Link problem.

Reviews.Title: Value.
Reviews.Author: Rex Sapasap
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a decent 10" tablet to use at work and research to read PDFs.  I didn't need the fluff of branding or extras, just needed a tablet with a decent OS and the ability to read external memory.  So far, the gtab has met all my expectations.  It has decent battery life (charge every other day), great interface, and is easy to use and learn.  For $200, it is well worth it.  Some negatives...the cover for the ports is annoying but I have a leather case and just tuck it in leaving the ports accessible.  Also, don't expect the best touch screen performance.  While it isn't that bad, it doesn't compare to the iPad or other major brands.  If you are looking for a great value, this would be a decent investment.

Reviews.Title: good tablet for its price
Reviews.Author: Andy jk
Reviews.Content: im a new user of tablets but a deep user of android phones. and in a simple way i will say my choice for this tablet was the perfect one for its price. most of all is the battery life. i dont really have to save anything on this tablet. with moderate use. it will only fall to 92% in daily basis for me. so i charge it once in two days. now that is what i call awesome.down side for me is only one. the multi touch is not that good for art. or for the universal stylus. i will suggest anyone to go for it.

Reviews.Title: wifi range is horrible
Reviews.Author: John R. Day "j day"
Reviews.Content: I literally had to sit right next to the wireless router for it to get a signal. other than that it was fine.

Reviews.Title: Another one bites the dust :(
Reviews.Author: NJ4evr
Reviews.Content: I did my due diligence and read ALL the reviews on here and made the decision to allow my 12year old to use her savings to purchase this tablet, in hopes that we could add to the positive reviews.  Sadly, we can not.  We, like so many others, can not get our tablet to boot up any longer after less than one month of use.  We did everything the manual said and still nothing.  We used only their charger, charged it fully upon receipt, reset it and still nothing.  Buyer beware.  This is an issue that I'm sure played a part in this tablet no longer being available here on Amazon.  I guess what they say is reality, if it seems too good to be true, it probably is.I hope that Matricom will stand behind its word and refund our money.  It takes a 12yr old an awful long time to save $200.

Reviews.Title: quad core. great
Reviews.Author: Florence
Reviews.Content: Low cost. Made in america. Real american support. You can buy cheap tablets made in China. And when you turn them on everything is in Chinese and no support. Ever try returning something to China. I was fooled by low cost China tablet once. MADE IN USA and customer service in USA.

Reviews.Title: Does not work!
Reviews.Author: monique
Reviews.Content: The tablet is charged but nothing appears on the screen when I turn it on.  It is clearly on because the backlight comes up, but the screen remains completely blank.  I ordered this as a Christmas present for my mom and I had been hoping to get it all set up so she could start using it as soon as she opened it on Christmas morning.  Now I have no gift for her at all.  I would rate this with zero stars if I could.  What a way to ruin Christmas.  Thanks for nothing.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware!
Reviews.Author: V. ladeira
Reviews.Content: These unit's have poor WiFi range. The price has dropped 60$ in the past month(wonder why?).. I'm on my second G-tab. Matricom sent me a replacement assuring me that it was a fluke. LOOK at other reviews. Both units have extremely short range. I've tried different routers and channels. I get about 30 feet usable range then the WiFi performance drops off dramatically. It picks up 2 of my 3 routers in my house. My wife's Asus tablet picks up over 15 routers. No issues. Originally Matricom told me on the phone that they where aware of the problem and were working on a fix but had no ETA.  I really wish there is a fix for this problem but I think it's a hardware design issue. If your not interested in WiFi range then this is a great unit for the new price. Just make sure your router is close to the unit.

Reviews.Title: Quantum 10.1 Android
Reviews.Author: satisfied customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered a Matricom g-Tab Quantum 10.1 inch android table as I am very happy with the tablet itself, the problem that I have it when I got it the screen was already scratched, I ordered a new one I know it was shipped from a third party as I have ordered a lot of products from Amazon and has had no problems with them.  I am disappointed at the screen being scratched but I an happy with the product.  I wish they would have taken the time to check the screen before it was shipped to me.  I am not going to go through the hassel of shipping it back it just that I am disappointed in this third party product.  I am always happy with Amazon and its service.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Cool tablet
Reviews.Author: W. Andrews "Dr. Cheeks"
Reviews.Content: Overall I think it's a quality tablet. I am on my third because the first one they sent android OS went haywire and unusable after 5 days of use, the second one was DOA (dead on arrival) and now I have had zero problems with the current. I have had it about a month and half which is why I was waiting to write this review.I bought it for all the connections... HDMI, USB, etc.. It feels like a well built piece of equipment... Camera is 3 mp but I'm not using it so does not matter. It's Android so you know what you're getting. Screen and resolution are great. WIRELESS is pretty flaky if you're not very close to the Access Point.I bought a case specifically designed for it. Problem is the bottom is poorly designed, it slips out if it's standing at an angle which makes using the power, volumes button and connections very difficult.Customer service took a couple of days to respond when I submitted a ticket. I did not call so I don't know if it's faster. They paid for all the shipping for the returns. I did not raise a fuss because this is my first tablet so "if you've never had something, you don't know what you're missing" is my philosophy.I would recommend it mainly because of Size of Screen, Screen Resolution and Connections (HDMI, USB, SD).

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: A Burnikel
Reviews.Content: So glad I got this. It performs perfectly and the price was excellent when you look at what's already built into it.  I'm super happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Works fast.
Reviews.Author: felix
Reviews.Content: It doesn't feel cheap, and is very fast. I mostly enjoy using it for videos because the quality is very good.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Emile R. Grant
Reviews.Content: Great Tab at an excellent price! The touch screen responds well and the quad core provides ample speed for tasks.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Bob Cross
Reviews.Content: Quick and easy to use. Would recommend to anyone who needs a tablet at a value price.  Very good for anything.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Chris C.
Reviews.Content: I have had this tablet for about 3 weeks now.PROS: Good Price  Long Battery life  SizeCONS: Charger cable limits use. It cannot charge with the same mini USB cable that most other devices use.  Charger port doesn't seem to be very durable. After three weeks I am having trouble charging the tablet. Now I cannot use  it while it is charging. I am considering returning it.

Reviews.Title: Matricom Tablet
Reviews.Author: RAUL
Reviews.Content: This tablet Rocks! Quad-core is a plus and It's very fast.Well made with micro hdmi output so i can plug this to my tv, or projector and show movies and videos,Pictures Etc.

Reviews.Title: great exchange system they have
Reviews.Author: ajames007
Reviews.Content: Brought the first one as a Christmas present and the power button got stuck. It was sent back for repairs. But a full refundWas issued.when back online and this time the price waa reduced by 20 percent and no problems with the new one.

Reviews.Title: Hands Down...Best tablet for the money!
Reviews.Author: Charles L. Lake
Reviews.Content: Before buying a tablet, i researched. This tablet, under one review, it said,"Longest battery life of any tablet". When i got it, I found that it was true!. I could work with this tablet for over three days before having to charge the battery. It was faster than my friends Samsung tablets. Outstanding boot time when you turn it on. I ordered one for my wife and convinced four of my friends to get them. That's six tablets, and no one has said they have any problems. This tablet also connected to my router anywhere in the house, and in the yard. The 7 inch Dual core does not perform like the 10 inch Matricom. I don't know why, could be because the 10 inch one is Quad-Core

Reviews.Title: absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: lora fuchs
Reviews.Content: I have had a tablet before, one of those no names, little 7 inch ones. The people that have complained about this tablet either had lemons or were spoiled by more expensive ones. But I love it, it does everything they said it would. No problems with WIFI connectivity either! Not any where! I love it!!!! I sincerely  recommend this tablet to everyone! It is a 4 core, it is as fast or faster than a laptop and desktop!!!! Fast delivery too!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for everyday use
Reviews.Author: Lori L
Reviews.Content: I've gone through a couple tablets and this one has lasted the longest and works the best. I can play games, pay bills and just browse. Super fast, better than my laptop was. Going to get another for my daughter to do her online classes and a couple 7 inch for my boys to play on. The battery has lasted longer than most tablets as well, I can play for 4 hours nonstop and still have battery left. Definitely recommend you give it a try, especially if you're like me and can't afford the really expensive tablets with popular brand names.

Reviews.Title: granny is happy
Reviews.Author: squiggy
Reviews.Content: If anyone is looking for a really good tablet buy this one.....we bought a cheaper one first and learned a valuable lesson.... Don't be penny wise and pound foolish.  It is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy 3rd country electronics - they don't work
Reviews.Author: bbfra88in#
Reviews.Content: Crashed a few times within the first hour of use.  It died after 4 days of use.  The 4 days of use were not delightful.  It is not fast enough to be entertaining - even for simple games/apps.  I purchased this based on the reviews - after reading the reviews again, I believe they must be written by the company that made the device - or, the company probably hired people to write them (the English in the manual is a joke - a 5 year old kid could write a better manual with his/her crayons).  I am returning this device with a lesson learned - never buy electronics from 3rd country companies.  I am certainly not racist by saying that - but these companies produce an extremely poor product, and the people they hire work for hardly any money.  Spend the extra money on a name brand.  You will be much happier in the long run (and a name brand device is not much more than this is)

Reviews.Title: Great value.  Incrediblely fast speeds.
Reviews.Author: Ruthann Lesperance
Reviews.Content: This tablet surpassed my expectations. It can handle multiple programs running at the same time. It handles gaming very well, however I'm not sure about some of the big games.  Camera is so/so but good enough for Skype. I am very picky and frankly this tablet has given me no problems so far. Its been about 5months.  Thanks for a product that does what it says.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable Tablet Deal
Reviews.Author: ~:TLH:~
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great!  The hardware and build quality for the price is unbeliveable. I have compared it directly to a 2nd Gen iPad and it blows the iPad out of the water when it comes to performance.  The display on the iPad is clearly much better than what you get on the G-Tab but it still produces a great picture and smooth fluid motion for HD video.I have installed XBMC, PLEX and a number of other demanding applications on this thing for testing and it has breezed through them all.  It streams video with ease and produces a great user experience for those looking to have a true hand held media player.  Skype works exactly as you would expect and the 10" screen is great.I highly suggest this tablet to anyone looking.YOU WILL NOT find a better tablet out there under $200.

Reviews.Title: awsome tablet
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: I like it still no problems! Runs fast and does what I want or need it to do. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Carla Taylor
Reviews.Content: Tablet runs great, very fast starts very fast!, and switches from one app to another quickly, definetly recommend it to everyone

Reviews.Title: Perfect for beginners
Reviews.Author: lynn
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for my mom she was new to using a tablet and was well established with the android based use as she had an android phone this is a perfect match for her she got the tablet she wanted and it does everything you could do a Samsung tablet or an iPad and works fairly fast we've had it for about two months now and it's still working perfectly

Reviews.Title: Truely Amazing
Reviews.Author: Danny P.
Reviews.Content: Exelent tablet. No lag.. neat HD Display. Great keyboard and vibrates on key press. Just beyond amazed and pleased with this tablet. If they offered ,e more than 5 stars, I'd go beyond it. Well worth the price . Highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: Wifi connection is awful
Reviews.Author: duder
Reviews.Content: For email and internet its ok. Cannot stream video through Wifi without being 8 feet or less from router. This includes: YouTube,  HBO GO, NETFLIX. Resolution is not ideal.

Reviews.Title: Inconsistent performance
Reviews.Author: mg
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to give this tablet a chance but I had to return it based on a few issues that I had. When I first received the tablet I noticed a black strip on the corner of the screen that was most likely an assembling error I ignored it because it was on a corner and not particularly noticeable. The first week I had the tablet it well after that I would occasionally get buggy or would take longer to load pages on e-book or comics.Finally I got too much inconsistent performance on wifi. I always receive a fairly strong signal with the tablet but I always get different readings for download/upload speeds. One time I'll be with in 10 feet of my router getting the correct bandwidth and 5 minutes later I won't even get close to 1mbps.I suspect that my problems with inconsistency in performance reflect an inconsistency with internal build quality, (the out side of the tablet is sturdy). It seems ordering this tablet is a bit of a gamble on getting one that performs vs getting one that has problems. After ordering one I really don't want to take the gamble of getting a bad one again and wasting time.

Reviews.Title: Came to me in disrepair
Reviews.Author: Alfin Taylor
Reviews.Content: I had to return this item. the screen was terrible, had wiggly lines in it. I must have gotten a bad one, based on the good reviews it Iread, but I did not like it.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional device
Reviews.Author: jodi closser
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best tablets I have worked with. The screen is bright and the colors are vibrant and very receptive. The fact that this is a quad  core 10.1 inch for under $200.00,  and it is just as nice as the more expensive ones is awesome. I have bought a few different tablets and returned them for not staying connected to wifi and freezing a lot. This tablet does everything it's supposed to do. I'm very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: fricken awsome
Reviews.Author: michael augustus
Reviews.Content: had this tablet just a couple days  runs every app i downloaded perfect except for vudu runs netflix, wwe network run fast smooth no lag whats so ever the wifi works great never drops a signal great streaming BUY THIS TABLET I STRONGLY URGE CAN NOY BEAT THIS PRICE

Reviews.Title: Such a great product
Reviews.Author: Sheila S.
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this tablet!  Everyone that has seen it, has been impressed.  It is smart looking, really easy to use, and has allthe features I wanted.  I like the largerscreen size, too.  AND the price was great!  I ended up buying a portfolio with a keyboard for it for $12.00 from Amazon.  I am very happy with everything!

Reviews.Title: Owner for 1 and 1/2 Weeks... The Description is Not as What it Promises...
Reviews.Author: Eric. B
Reviews.Content: At first I was thrilled to get this product as it arrived quickly but after I received it I felt very disappointed at the tablet in terms of what the description promised.My main gripe with this tablet is its not a true HD style screen comparing this to a tablet I recently bought as this tablet's replacement (Wal-mart's HiSense Sero 7 Pro). Its fuzzy, especially when swiping to move the screen to view something else and even when viewing black or dark backgrounds, pictures and videos, the screen flickers as you can see horizontal lines "bounce and dance" from top to bottom of the screen as if it had some issues, I found this annoying at night when view videos or pictures. I had factory reset this tablet about 5 times to see if it fixed the problem and I had no luck.Sometimes (especially for those who use Go Launcher EX) It lags quite a bit. Even when not using Go Launcher EX the touch input is slightly slow. I would say no more than about 1/4 of a second. Very critical when playing games or doing quick swipes.However the general overall speed and graphic capabilities of the tablet allowed me to play games such Sonic Dash and Emulators from NES to Sega Genesis with little to no issues other than the input lag on the touch screen. The wifi and bluetooth abilities are ok from wifi I'm about a good 15 feet away from the router going through a wall that's about 4 inches thick and had no slowdown when viewing Netflix and Youtube videos in HD (As HD can get on this screen in particular) and using a bluetooth gamepad worked fine as well.Overall I have to rank this a 3 out of 5.Cons:That this isn't a true HD screen. The screen is fuzzy and it flickers horizontal lines on dark and black pictures and backgrounds is very annoying at night.The Cameras are too flickery and images are too blurry to make out. I didn't use these to take video or use Skype with.The lag input may be ok for those who need a tablet just to use for daily and work tasks but if you want to play games be warned about the 1/4 of a second of input lag.It hangs up and freezes at time during some apps, I had to clear the ram and the cache a few times to clear that problem.This tablet can't charge through a USB port, it uses its own AC charge with a small circular port on the end that you may find on older cameras and this is annoying seeing that by standard that most devices can charge through a normal 2.0 USB port.Pros:The build is made of a dense metal casing and it feels very sturdy. However the side where all the connection ports are is a plastic however the ports are hidden in a clasp and the clasp is hard to open up as I feared to open it as I though it would break off so be careful of your finger nails when opening it.Wifi and Bluetooth works well within the particular range of a standard host device. I tested out the Play Store and downloaded apps with no problems, used Dolphin Browser with no problem and also used Skype for general instant messaging and there were no problems sending and receiving messages. I also used Netflix and Youtube with no lag or issues.Sound is ok considering the speaker is Mono, just watch nothing covers the speaker but the headphone jack works fine when listening to music and videos.I would only recommend this tablet for those who are starting out using tablets, who aren't out for a true HD screen, need this for daily internet usage, curtain work tasks or for children. Fair Warning!

Reviews.Title: WHEN WORKING DECENT, BUT COMPLETELY FROZE AFTER 2 DAYS
Reviews.Author: Lisa Frank
Reviews.Content: I was so happy to have a tablet within my price range, but unfortunately it froze after 2 days and I tried everything to get it back going for the past 5 day.  I really believed the reviews, but unfortunately my experience was not a good one.  Returning tomorrow.  Also, when I transferred the apps to SD card to save space, the app was no longer accessible.  Have never written reviews on Amazon before and am very sorry that I don't have a better report.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected.........
Reviews.Author: its so fun my daughter loves it
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews on this tablet I thought it would be a "Good" tablet & unfortunatley it was Not what I expected.  The picture on this tablet was so Grainy that it was almost Blurry to even see what was on the screen & the volume was Not good either.  I decided to go with the Samsung Galaxy which I am very familiar with.  Better Luck Next Time.........

Reviews.Title: Poor Wi-Fi and slow responsiveness
Reviews.Author: J Ponder
Reviews.Content: I tired to work with this one.  Paid a bit more for a inexpensive tablet thinking the Quad Core and 1GB RAM was the solution.  Not at all.  I have an old single core and a a 3-4 month old dual core-512MB RAM tablet that performs better.  The biggest issue was the wi-fi.  I got 2 waves when sitting 10 feet from router. The same router that we pick up on phones, other tablet and laptop while outside 40-50 yards away.  I can literally sit this next to my 7 month old Blu Life Play phone, 2 year old Galaxy Player 5, 18 month old Acer laptop, or 4 month old , don't know name, $125 10 inch tablet, and I will have full signal while this one fluctuates between 1 and 2 waves.  This is on our kitchen table which is mid way between our TWO wireless routers.  Midway is approx 25 feet with one wall between each router and the devices.  All of the devices mention, in addition to a Galaxy Note 10.1 tablet can go to the end of the block and still pick up some signal.  This one loses router about 10 feet from door for a total of about 30-35 feet from closes router.  Just sucky...  Either spend less on a more highly rated inexpensive tablet, or spend more on a brand name such as Samsung.  This is not a good middle ground.

Reviews.Title: Not all that
Reviews.Author: Edward Lafuente
Reviews.Content: Good for games and to run small applications. but when you run videos on it, it is sluggish at best and if you use you Bluetooth you have to be inches from it to keep connected other wise you loose connection. WiFi is also the same. For kids it should be OK but for adults that use it for real, forget about it. I changed it for the Google tablet and it was way better then the G-Tab.

Reviews.Title: User friendly
Reviews.Author: Suzie
Reviews.Content: My husband and I wanted a tablet that we could carry around the house and take to work when needed.  Since we were buying two, we really didn't want to spend a ton of money, but we wanted quality.  We are both extremely pleased with this tablet.  It worked right out of the box.  We never looked at the operating book because it wasn't needed.  The quality has surprised us.  It meets all of our needs.  The battery life is surprising.  We didn't charge until day two!  Love the haptic feedback on the screen.  I will be using this as a reader and the screen is just right for books and magazines.  Buy it,  You will be happy you did.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: james colburn
Reviews.Content: I received my G tab today and have been on it all afternoon. I still have a learning curve where androids are concerned but I'm impressed so far. My battery started getting low after about 5 hours but I've used it continually. I wanted an inexpensive tablet to use with charting. I wanted a large screen without investing $500.  This seems to work perfectly for me to do my stock trading without having to carry around a heavy laptop. Wish it had more storage but I'm going to get a microsd. I may be surprised later but for now I'm happy with my purchase.Jim

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: BL5120
Reviews.Content: Decided I wanted to try a tablet, never had one before. I found it to be fast, responsive and very easy to use. The only thing that I don't like it the little plastic cover over the ports, need to get rid of it some how! Other than that its great. A few things I noticed. The description states it's 7.5 inches wide its actually only 7.00 inches. That made a huge difference when shopping for cases. I bought the Aerb Universal Case for 9" and 10 " tablets with the bluetooth keyboard- Aerb® Universal 8.9-10.1 Inch Tablet PC Portfolio Leather Case with Detachable Bluetooth Keyboard For Apple iPad 1/2/3/4/5 9.7 inch Tablet, Samsung Galaxy Tab 1 / 2 / 3, Note 10.1 inch Tablet, Asus Transformer TF101 TF201 TF300 TF600 TF700, Goggle Nexus...Fit is perfect and works great!! All in all, at this price point and with the level of quality the manufacturer put into the product - its a great find! I'd recommend it to my friends and buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Decent functionality
Reviews.Author: Michael Cooper
Reviews.Content: This is a very good high tech tablet, but it is physically smaller than my original 10.1" tablet and does not fit the keyboard stand that I used with my old tablet. The location of the USB, SD card, and video connectors is a bad design that also makes my keyboard holder/stand unusable. The plastic cover is an unnecessary and flimsy design that should be eliminated in the next iteration of this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Nice when it works
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It froze after two  days of use.  I do like it when it was working.  I contacted the seller and they will send another and I will try again.  This will be the last time I try.

Reviews.Title: Not pleased with the product
Reviews.Author: Joe Walters
Reviews.Content: Received on 2/14 and the tablet worked well. Added some apps and an SD card over the weekend, all was well. Then on 2/18 no more tablet, I turned it off in the afternoon and that evening it would not reboot. Taking it to UPS for return tomorrow. Really disappointed because it had everything I was looking for in a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Not as reliable - need quality control
Reviews.Author: Forgers87466
Reviews.Content: I ordered the tablet after seeing many good reviews on Amazon, despite many other negative reviews. It would've been a good budget tablet at the price if it worked stably.  I didn't want to pay extra for a brand name tablet, and the specs of this tablet seemed good enough for my uses.Unfortunately, I must've gotten one of the bad ones - the screen had constant static color noises in the entire screen, and they were pretty noticeable against certain background colors (e.g., Skype's sky bluish color).  I could not read a pdf (one of the primary reasons for buying the tablet) because these color jitters were constantly moving in the background.  After a few hours of checking out the features, the tablet froze and I had to do a hard factory reset as a normal reset would not make it bootable again. The tablet started making a strange noise when booting up, like electric components starting.I really think this tablet could've been a good choice had it worked stably.  Unfortunately, the quality control on this tablet seems very bad.  I returned it the same day and ordered a somewhat more expensive ASUS tablet after looking at similar no-name brand tablets with good specs.  They all seemed to have quality control issues.  Luckily, Amazon refunded the whole thing, so no complaints.Pros:- decent specs for the price- Amazon refunds if defectiveCons:- low quality control - very easy to get a bad one, and doubtful that it will last- no system updates available- other cheap tablets with better specs have started popping up on Amazon

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: kathy
Reviews.Content: great tablet. picture is perfect. on/off button is very smooth and hard to find with your fingertip. Got for my mom to play games, watch movies, and her address book, and email/facebook. she finds it very easy to navigate, she is getting used to it.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price.  Weak speaker, average camera...but good for the internet.
Reviews.Author: Barb in Michigan
Reviews.Content: Hmmm.... I have to try to explain why I am only giving this tablet 4 stars.  I think maybe it's my own fault as my expectations were unrealistic.  I liked the fact that it has USB ports, along with the option to add a SD card, which I did.  The main reason I purchased it was to store photos when I travel.  I just got back from a trip wherein I took about 1,200 photos, and boy did I struggle with importing them from my camera to the tablet.  It was slow, cumbersome, and the thumbnails didn't display properly.  I ended up losing a couple hundred photos - and have no clue why.  As a tablet, it worked perfectly.  I was able to easily surf the internet, check email, listen to music...oh, but the speaker is really weak, and the camera is of average quality.Overall, if you just wish to read books, check email, and surf the net - this tablet will work very well.  I will keep this, and use it for just that, since it was priced so reasonably.  This is my first tablet, so maybe my expectations were beyond what they can offer.

Reviews.Title: Great quality & Good price
Reviews.Author: JamesBrrando
Reviews.Content: Pretty impressed with the quantum. Never heard of this company matricom before ,but after this ill buy more of their products. The tablet is fast and is perfect for browsing the net my emails and stuff. For this price i can afford another to give away. Love this thing. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: I like this Tablet
Reviews.Author: Hector Matute
Reviews.Content: The Tablet seems to be alright however  the wi fi is lousy  you need to be close  to the router to get good signal..The battery life is great, hd screen which you can play hd videos from youtubeIf you can install a wifi extender the wi fi issue won't be  a problem.

Reviews.Title: Great picture on this one!
Reviews.Author: Dale Corpe
Reviews.Content: while I like this unit a lot it came with a very difficult to read manual. I'm a first time tablet user and they seem to think you're an expert right out of the gate. The tablet has a very appealing exterior, is light weight and while access to the HDMI and other ports is little clunky, overall I'm very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Have to wait and see
Reviews.Author: jaime
Reviews.Content: I decided to give this tablet a try. Its a good tablet but mine could not connect to my mobile phone's hotspot. I have a samsung note from verizon. I contacted matricom customer service and they had me update the firmware to see if it would fix the problem. However, it failed to update and the tablet never rebooted much less power back on. They set me up for an exchange so we will have to see if the new one works. I will update when I get the new one.

Reviews.Title: NEEDS A SPEAKER IN THE FRONT
Reviews.Author: tammy
Reviews.Content: WORKS GREAT I HAVE HAD NO ISSUES BOUGHT IT FOR MY 6 YEAR OLD AND HE DOES SCHOOL WORK BUT WE HAVE TO CUT EVERYTHING OFF IN THE ROOM SO YOU CAN HERE THE SPEAKER

Reviews.Title: G-Tab price, gives other makers and Kindle; a run for their money,
Reviews.Author: cara
Reviews.Content: This review, is coming from a wife of an Intel Engineer; whom is not allowed to buy electronics on her own. But, I did on this product and glad I did; even hubby couldn't find fault for the price. Yes, who wouldn't want Samsung or an Apple tablet; but for my first tablet the price was a big factor. Being a wife of an Engineer, you almost have to do a spreadsheet or foils when buying electronics; without hubby involved. So, there was a lot of research involved before purchase and 85% were in favor of company and product.Bottom line, if you look hard enough; you will find negativity on any product. It all boils down to "why and what for" are you going to use the tablet for; mine is for entertainment and huge specs are not needed. In my own little blonde brain, being a Kindle owner for years; this purchase is so much cheaper then the Kindle Fire HDX wifi 32GB.

Reviews.Title: perfect for watching movies or reading
Reviews.Author: Donnell Hauser
Reviews.Content: I have only had the tablet for a little over a week. So I will readd some info later.Pros: It easy to see everything.  The screen is very clearCons: If more than a few things are running it freezes.  The calibration is slow if you are a fast typer on screen.

Reviews.Title: Died 4 days after i received  it
Reviews.Author: H. Worsham "heagle3"
Reviews.Content: I loved my G-Tab Quantum when I first received it. Fast with large screen. Wanted to watch movies and read e-books. I just got a dud, lemon. I returned it for an exchange paid $9.00 postage. Will give update when I receive replacement.

Reviews.Title: It's a good 10 inches Android OS 4.2.2 tablet with a low price. Compare with name brands not much different
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Android tablet. The first one is iRuLu 7 inches tablet and I still like it and its small enough put in my pocket on the go. Only problem I have with the 7 inches iRuLu is when I open more than 3 windows the browser close and also the screen is small for me when I use it at home. I use 3 laptop and a desk top PC but I want a 10 inches tablet just for go to the web.  I do the research and read the reviews, I choose this Matricom G Tab 10 Android, is a 10 inches tablet with OS 4.2.2.I open 4 windows when I am on the web and doing good, but open more than 5 windows is slow down but not auto close the browser, instead ask to wait or close the browser. WiFi, I setup downstairs and get good signal upstairs. I don't plan to play games with this tablet so I don't know how good or bad on the games or download a lot of Apps.  All the common use Apps are already installed, just turn it on and ready to go.  Battery, I total used about 6 hrs after full charge and still shows about 50% battery left. As all Androids tablet to turn on/off, there are two way. One is quick turn off (Sleep mode still use battery) and total turn off, (hold power for about 5 sec, not sleep mode). When is at total power off mode, to turn back on need to hold the power button 5 sec.  Put 32 Micro SD Card (TF Card) work.  USB (is a mini USB Not a Micro USB as its said) I try with a Mini USB OTG cable from my iRuLu work and see flash drive and Microsoft USB wireless mouse, but the 2 USB cables (Not know is regular mini USB or Mini OTG) come with the box is hard to put in, I don't put force to put it in that might damage the port.  Bluetooth, try with IPad Bluetooth wireless key board work.  Don't try with the HDMI cable yet.  The Cover for the USB, Micro SD, HDMI is hard to open, be careful might broke the cover plastic attachment, use finger nail to open.  So far I use it for about 3 week and don't know how long it will last.  One minor complain is the cord for the power supply is about 4 feet long need extension cord from the wall outlet.  Manual, I did not open.  Over all I give 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: a good pc tablet
Reviews.Author: rideaux
Reviews.Content: i chose this tablet because it offered more than the others i looked at.the size is good butit does freezee sometime and the sound quality could be bettet overall i like it i would recommendit to others

Reviews.Title: Good product excellent price
Reviews.Author: Sandro Ariel Adolf
Reviews.Content: I have been using the G-Tab Quantum 10 for about a week now and I am quite happy with the experience:- large and sharp screen/images- good speed- no problems in connecting to Wi-Fi- excellent use of batteryAt a 155 dollar price tag this is a real bargain.Things I think could be improved:- does not have GPS (but probably this is one of the reasons why battery lasts longer...)- speaker is at the back of the tablet (sound quality could be improved)

Reviews.Title: Works well and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Trombone Rick
Reviews.Content: I held back one star because the Bluetooth interface has to be reset after each turn-on before it will talk to a Bluetooth keyboard.  I am very pleased and this tablet has taken over many tasks from my desktop computer.

Reviews.Title: Graduation present
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: The graphics on this table is awsome.  The speed is incredible.  My son loves this gift.  I love this gift.

Reviews.Title: Great features
Reviews.Author: Mr Anthony R Schleh
Reviews.Content: Great quality and features for the price.  I've recommended this to 8 other people.  They all purchased it and love it!

Reviews.Title: As Advertised.
Reviews.Author: kris. ess
Reviews.Content: What they say is what you get. My granddaughter has been using it intensively and has no complaints. She tends to remove the kid gloves when she is using electronic devices. She loves this tablet.So so I

Reviews.Title: Cool Tablet and Still going!
Reviews.Author: Angel Heart "Geek-Guy"
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this tablet and I like it too!  This tablet works fast and smartly as it zips from one app to another.The wifi connection is solid and does not drop with this tablet.
