We have down loaded games for the kids and carried this tablet on many road trips.I have had other tablets that were failures and left me upset because of their poor performance.This tablet is cool for guys and stylish for the ladies.I give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: denise
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this tablet, easy to use. Take it everywhere with me! Have recommended it to several people. Thank you

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: M. Panichelii "M. Panichelli"
Reviews.Content: Works great and I can't put in down! customer service was wonderful and addressed and solved my problem. Thank you Matricom!

Reviews.Title: Matricom G-Tab Quantum 10" Tablet
Reviews.Author: emiee55
Reviews.Content: I bought the tablet for my son-in-law for his birthday so he could upgrade from a 7" tablet. He just loves it for gaming! The colors are clear and bright and the battery seems to last for a long time. I would recommend this tablet! Thanks for offering it at a great price! I would buy another one on the future!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Horror Business
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement for my girlfriend's dead laptop. If you are familiar with the Android OS and need something primarily for web browsing, you should check this out. We've seen no lag in response time and it works fine for streaming video, etc. I was concerned by other reviews that said the wi-fi was spotty, but I have seen no evidence of that in the unit we received, at all. It's fine even with multiple walls between it and the router.I haven't investigated too thoroughly, but it seems like the software may not be supported any more. Attempting to check for updates returns an error. Using the Android Firefox browser consistently hard-crashes the device. Luckily, the default browser is good enough. The buttons seem sturdy and the screen is nice and pretty. Battery life is fantastic so far.

Reviews.Title: class  cracks too easy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Good function and very responsive but the glass cracked after one week of serious use.  Where to send for repair? Then full 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Excellant
Reviews.Author: Nancy B.
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. Some of my friends have samsung galaxy that I have played around with but I love mine better. In my opinion it has a better touch screen. There are so many other features that I like. I wish they had an 8 inch just like this but the smaller ones have less battery life.

Reviews.Title: 6 months later and I still love it!
Reviews.Author: SB H.
Reviews.Content: Bought mine last thanksgiving and very impressed then. (my first tablet to replace a dying xp laptop) A few things do still annoy me about it: speaker is on the back side so often I can't hear it, especially on YouTube. Also tried to get a cover for it then, but it's a slightly off size- universal cases don't work well or parts broke on them, so order the one Matricom is selling now- I will be!  I have to use Cleanmaster constantly to clean up memory and privacy issues, otherwise it slows way down.  Looking forward to ordering a 7 incher or maybe the new quad core soon- its cheaper than I paid for mine last year even with the discount available from matricom then!

Reviews.Title: the tablet is ok, but the case is not fitting properly. i also need to send the one i  previously bought back.  the case is flem
Reviews.Author: robert romanstine
Reviews.Content: the tablat is ok.  but the case is not fitting properly.  i also need to send the one i previously bought back.  the case will not stay up, it is just a flemsy case.  please let me know what i need to do

Reviews.Title: Wow for the price
Reviews.Author: Skunk hound
Reviews.Content: Wow. I love this thing. I gave it to my wife as trade for her laptop. I was just meant for general use but it does everything. I put blue ray rips on it an it can push it though it's hdmi to 50" tv. It comes rooted. Battery life is great. Wifi is a lil touchy. I have an iphone. I got my folks an iPad. Those are kinda better, they cost several times as much. This is a great tablet, if you don't want the best

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL
Reviews.Author: Danni
Reviews.Content: I fell in love the moment I got it. High quality screen, smooth body, feels good and not too heavy. It's quick also, only dislike is I feel the storage is very low but fixed with an external SD card. 100% awesome!

Reviews.Title: Happy with first tablet purchase
Reviews.Author: GAIL MORRISON
Reviews.Content: The price was right.  This tablet would make an excellent gift for a child.  Tip ... order well in advance of occation. It took a long time to arrive.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the money!
Reviews.Author: Scott Dean
Reviews.Content: I really like my G-Tab tablet.  I really like how fast it goes from one thing to another.  It turns on really fast.  It doesn't lag at all.  The battery last for a good long time.  It seems like it stays at 100% for a good hour or two before it starts to come down.  I like how it already has downloaded apps on it.  The only thing that I wished it had was more memory on it.  I have down loaded more apps and that I am running out of memory space.  I have a SD card init but I need to learn how to put programs on the SD card. Other than that I love my G-Tab tablet!

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: John Q. Public
Reviews.Content: Stable, lightweight, bright, great performance, great price.  It's Rooted out of the box.  I couldn't be happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: problems with Bluetooth connectivity
Reviews.Author: Jaime A. Pinillos
Reviews.Content: It seems as the device is having problems with the blue-tooth connectivity, I had to restart the tablet in order to make it work

Reviews.Title: matricom g-tab
Reviews.Author: D. lopaus "washashore"
Reviews.Content: picure, sound(only one speaker),looks all seem very good.  boots up faster than my asus tab. which is good. for the money you won't go wrong.  dave

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: curt
Reviews.Content: Its been a great tablet . Especially for the price. Long battery life. Only problem is I have to turn the wi fi  on and off sometimes

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Brian M Wrixton
Reviews.Content: I have had this product for quite some time now and use it almost daily. I would definitely recommend it to friends and family and purchase it again.

Reviews.Title: great tablet in the top ten best tablets
Reviews.Author: Andrea A.
Reviews.Content: Awesome tablet, crystal clear picture, super fast.Great tablet for the money. Only down side is power cord has a pin connector. They need to make only USB. This is my second gaudcore even with the pin which is why I had to purchase another tablet,  out of all the tablets out there I still wanted my quad core. If you purchase square trade policy w/it and if something goes wrong you will have no worries because your new grab will be at your door before you miss the one you lost

Reviews.Title: The Matricom
Reviews.Author: Linda lopez
Reviews.Content: I am choosing this rating cause ever since I received it and I hooked it up with the hot spot it will workand sometimes it will not work; what I mean is; that when I try to change a site or am looking for awebsite it will not move: and I am disappointed with it- cause I'm beginning to think that maybe this tabletis not new like it was advertised, maybe it ws used before. And I believe it is too late to return it.Thank you; Linda

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted!!!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Erickson
Reviews.Content: I looked for about 2 months to find a replacement for my broken tablet. I choice this one. For the cost, size and speed it looked the best. When I got it was everything I hoped for.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: phillip
Reviews.Content: Does everything I won't it to do. Very fast to load movies and games, I'm glad I purchased this androild pad

Reviews.Title: great unit for its price
Reviews.Author: drjfjr
Reviews.Content: the  tablet is perfect for what i wanted it for. i am using it to read books, browse the web, skype, watch video, and take care of email while traveling. So far it has worked as well as i could expect. The build quality is not as nice as the name brand units costing hundreds more but as long as it work,holds up it is perfect for my needs. the build quality is the only reason for not giving it 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Matricom G-Tab Quantum 10TM Android 4.2 HD+ IPS Quad Core tablet
Reviews.Author: Jasmine
Reviews.Content: I love this product! It is really awesome!!! I love my tablet features and styles. It works really good also.

Reviews.Title: My girls love this tablet
Reviews.Author: rob Kammeyer
Reviews.Content: I wanted a quality tablet but not a huge price tag.These tablets definitely deliver everything that we were looking for.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Jesús Andrés Rivas Sánchez
Reviews.Content: Great product all on time excellent processor and cute style I bought like a gift for my girlfriendI recommend 100%

Reviews.Title: Ok, but don't expect too much
Reviews.Author: The Big B
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement for my Kindle Fire since my wife and kids took it over.  Out of the box, it seemed to work quite well.  I was able to play several games and read my books without any issue.After a couple of weeks, it seemed to shutdown and I had to force it to reboot.  Not a big deal, but after a couple of more times of this it seems to be more of an issue if you press/hold on the device in a certain spot it just shuts down.  Still not horrible, but just a pain.Since I've installed quite a few apps and tweaks, I decided to reboot it to factory defaults.  Bad decision there.  Now I can't get the Amazon Free App of the Day application installed.  Amazon thinks it's running iOS.  Used an APK extractor to take it off from my Kindle and it installed just fine.  However, the app now stops responding.  I'm going to have to try and extract it off from my Android phone in hopes that maybe it is just a version issue, but for it to think I'm running iOS is ridiculous.The WiFi is definitely not its strong point.  Very weak and a lot of times I have to turn it off and back on in order for it to connect after powering the unit on.If you want something for taking pictures, this device is useless.  Quality is horrible, but the description of the device even points that out.Game play is decent and as I said, reading is nice too.  I like the bigger screen, bluetooth, HDMI output and USB connection.  Its also nice to be able to power it through the micro USB and an actual power cord.My next purchase will be the Aerb® Universal 9-10 Inch Tablet Portfolio Leather Case W Detachable Bluetooth Keyboard.  Since I'm going to use this for some work, I'd like to be able to have a nice case and keyboard for it.  Hopefully, that will help to make up for some of the downfalls.Overall, nice replacement if you want a bigger screen than the Kindle Fire for the price.  Just don't expect it to be an iPad or Galaxy quality.

Reviews.Title: i really enjoy this tablet
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: at first i posted a review about it bootlooping when and the wifi not working, I than contacted matricom and they sent me a new tablet. Everything a beautiful about this tablet except the sound is kind of low.. other than that it has a great picture while playing games, watching netflix going on your email, and better yet it runs everything great and smooth. I wouldnt hesitated at all to buy this tablet i did a lot of researching what i could get for my money this tablet can do thing name brands cant. I went to bestbuy, Radio shack, walmart , pretty much anywhere you can think of. If you buy this tablet you will not be disappointed. One more thing, If there is any factory defect they will replace it up to a year from what i saw on there site. Who els would do that?

Reviews.Title: speaker
Reviews.Author: JoAnn Richardson
Reviews.Content: Every thing about the tablet is good but the speak location is not in a good place to have good volumn. But all in all I like it.

Reviews.Title: fast butit ran only 4days
Reviews.Author: Sherry Chalfant "troytxmom"
Reviews.Content: Loved it four days after I got it.  It froze up and turned it off wont come back on.will be seeing if someone will take it back. Update went to makers website  have live chat told me to reboot did as they said it reflashed , they told me to turn back on wouldnt come on had me a label to return it in less than 30 mins. tey just got it today 3/24/2014 see how long before i get it back.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: patricia shinault
Reviews.Content: very fast very clear I have had no problems  has not froze and takes a very good pictures with front or back cameras

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Chirs Mammenga
Reviews.Content: For the money, this is an awesome tablet.  The only reason it didn't get five stars is that, out of the box, it was difficult to set up.  There is a quick-start function that makes the tablet run goofy and crash.  In this mode many of the office and video apps ran poorly and crashed.  Once I took it out of this mode it has worked wonderfully.  I use it for everything.  I still haven't tried the HDMI output but otherwise everything seems to be working.  One other warning.  Spend the money for the Square Trade protection.  The shell isn't very sturdy and will probably break if dropped or impacted in any way.  I got a great keyboard case to keep it in and it seems to be alright now, but at first the case was so loose it made it hard to get the mini USB properly connected and the charger is very loose in the connection.  I doesn't snap into place like other tablets I've had.  When I mounted the SD card it actually missed the port and slid into the casing.  I thought I was going to be out a card but I managed to shake it free and remount it.  Works fine now.  Just be careful.  The Quad-Core processor is awesome and for the price it's a great tablet!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Aimee Lee
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a tablet that let's you transfer your apps off you SD cards and is affordable this is a great one. To me just as good as a Acer or Samsung. Way better than apple.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Whistler
Reviews.Content: I've been using this tablet for about a month and am, overall, very happy with it. The screen area is more than acceptable, and the resolution is easily adequate for my needs. The HDMI port facilitates interface with my flat screen TV without trouble. I was able to set up WiFi easily, and the range is not outstanding, but good enough for me. Seems to be about 30 feet or so. The accessory connector cover is, as noted by others, somewhat flimsy, and will detach easily, but it works. A USB charger would be preferable to the proprietary adapter included, and having non-replaceable batteries is a decided negative, but those issues are nothing much when you consider what you get for a comparatively low price. Do keep the charger handy for those prolonged streaming sessions. As a first tablet, this is a winner, and may very will be a winner as a second or third.

Reviews.Title: Nice inexpensive tablet
Reviews.Author: Carl A Milloshewski
Reviews.Content: If you have a choice of buying a Nintendo DS or this, I'd go for this.  The usb connection was a recent life saver on a business trip.  Connect a usb drive to this is a real plus!!

Reviews.Title: good tablet
Reviews.Author: Edward Richards
Reviews.Content: This tablet is as expected it meet all of my expectations and I would recommend it to anyone. who needed one.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit
Reviews.Author: Rudy Weber
Reviews.Content: It is a very good bargain for the money and the large screen is great! Easy to operate andnice installed features.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for husband.
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: My husband loves this tablet. Its capable of doing everything he wants it to. He's big on youtube movies and downloading music and he has not had a problem with either one.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: NisMaxed
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet, It is well made and runs perfectly.The Price is also good too. I might just buy another for my self, I bought the first one for my sister.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for a decent price
Reviews.Author: Kaelyn Johnson
Reviews.Content: I just received my tablet in the mail about an hour ago and it is working wonderfully. I have no idea why anyone would give this tablet a rating less than 4 stars its fast, it comes with Google Play and its a nice color! Along with this tablet I ordered the a keyboard case for it so I can take this to class instead of my heavy laptop. I am very satisfied with my purchase.Update: 3/3/14I just tried to listen to music on it with my headphones plugged into the tablet and the sound quality was atrocious, that seems to be the only downside so far.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Jones
Reviews.Content: Pretty nice tablet for the price. Picture quality is very grainy and not HD.  That is very disappointing. Ok ok.

Reviews.Title: absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: nicole
Reviews.Content: It came in really fast and everything was packaged carefully. Its really big which I love and works great. For the price its such a great deal. Everyone thinks its an iPad lol but if they only knew . So glad I purchased this item it works so good I bought 2! Definitely recommend this to ppl.

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet
Reviews.Author: erica
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet for the price. Decent battery life, easy to use android operating system. I am satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: liked it
Reviews.Author: Christy Randell
Reviews.Content: met my expectations.  no problems whatsoever.  does seem a bit laggy in response to touch sometimes but that is the only thing I found not perfect.

Reviews.Title: The tablet is OK, not bad though
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: i purchased the tablet brand new and received it on the 22nd of feb.2014. I rated this tablet 3 stars for a few reasons that i will go into later in my review. I want to say before i starte the review that i tried to give a fair and accurate description of the product with not hate in mind what so ever. Overall for $175.00 it wasn't a bad buy but not a great buy for "me" either an ill explain why.Cons:*What everyone complains about the most on the reviews for this tablet is the Wi-fi antenna which they are correct about. within 20 to 25 feet of a modem the connection is fine but drops off severely afterwards. My iphone off the same wi-fi works just fine any where in the house.*The sound quality from the speaker is not good. The single speaker is in the back of the tablet an its small and not loud at all. Watching youtube video's on full blast you literally need to turn off all other sounds in the house/room to barley hear the tablet. My iphone sound output in 3x louder then this tablet which is terrible in my opinion. (i had to buy a small mobile speaker)*Next is a quality control issue(personal) : When i took the tablet out of the box i immediately notice that it had looked like a piece of lint, or some small article underneath the glass of the touch screen in 2 areas. Not sure if its lint or a crack in the touch pad(not the top clear glass screen)? One area is not badly noticeable but the other i notice right off the back about a cm long! (maybe when they were laying the screen on, it was dusty that day or something??) i tried to call them about it, but i was on hold for over 10min so i hung up, will definitely call them back asap because there warranty is 30 days for them paying for the shiping on a bad product but afterwards, 1yr. but, you have to pay the shipping back and forth. Still its nice they have a 1yr warranty!The screen resolution: "This is not really a con as much as it is a small nit pick because the screen resolution is still nice!" The tablet is advertised at 1080px800 but i don't believe it is. I dont have anything to test that for a fact but i know what 1080p looks like an this tablet does not seem to have that type of clarity. The screen resolution is not bad at all it is very good and well lit (not dim or hard to read),so let me just say that first. But, that said, i don't believe its 1080p. unless theres a switch that you have to turn the 1080p resolution on, nothing that i viewed movie wise or just regular viewing was in 1080p, more like 1024x800p is what it seems like.Lastly, The camera: The camera is not good at all, which i expected that because the other reviews said the same thing. The clarity of the camera is old school, like the first camera lenses of the old smart phones. But, that said, they do serve there purpose of skyping or snapping a picture of mediocre quality and i'd rather have two cameras then not!Pro's:* Very good battery life and quick charge.* Very good not great screen resolution. (compared to a newer apple product.) but at this price its Very nice and not a disappointment at all trust. (i'm just nit picking).* Very quick speed through web pages and apps.* Came 100% charged.* Comes with Great features, apps and accessories.* Multi-tasking is a breeze with no lag.* A quality construction of product doesn't feel flimsy or cheap at all.* 1 year warranty on defects (very nice).* upgradeable memory up to 32gb.* 2 Camera's*Hopefully good customer service..lol but ill see about that when i come to them with my issues. Will update my review on seller and product after.Over all:I would buy this product for under $185. and feel like i got a good deal! I would have also rated it a 4 stars if i didn't have the personal issues with my tablet. This product would be a 5 star if they get a better speaker and Wifi antenna. Your going to sacrifice a few things the cheaper in price you go but for the money paid, its not a bad product, it's just restricted in certain ways.  If you can live with those issues stated above, i think this tablet is a good buy worth giving a try and you probably won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: Marlene
Reviews.Content: Great Tablet!!!!!! I love it, The sounds it is low, the WI-FI is okay, Really good presentation, the imaging is really good, I just get this tablet 3 days ago, so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Slow internal memory and only 75% function but the screen is amazing
Reviews.Author: TJ Hansen
Reviews.Content: It has a really amazing screen and the specs look good but actual functionality is up and down.  it cannot play vudu or google music but netflix and pandora work ok.  It seems to freeze up alot and the touchscreen multitouch works but is not as refined as mainstream tablets like the galaxy.  Good for the price but more of a tablet for a kid to play some apps and watch netflix (no amazon. no vudu, google movies, but aero works for tv)  I would return but didn't make the 30 day return period so I will give to my niece or something as a toy rather then a full functional tablet.  Again the screen is realy nice though.

Reviews.Title: Just okay.
Reviews.Author: Vicki D.
Reviews.Content: Don't expect to download tons of apps.  You will definitely need an SD card.  Sometimes bogs down, but a good sized tablet for the money!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with tablet
Reviews.Author: Edgar D.
Reviews.Content: I'm very satisfied with the G-Tab 10.1.  You really don't need the mostly lacking user manual.  Also Matricom hasn't replaced my power adapter yet after two tries.

Reviews.Title: Almost OK For The Price
Reviews.Author: Movie Guy
Reviews.Content: I can't complain too much about this tablet considering its cheap price. It's just OK as cheap tablets go, accomplishing most basic tasks in an OK manor. The one major problem I had was with the You Tube app. The videos only run for a few seconds before they pause to buffer. This happens continually as a video is playing (or is trying to play). I can't blame my network or router because the same You Tube videos run flawlessly on a variety of other tablets, computers, TVs and other devices in our house. I'd like to give it a 2.5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Cost vs Performance = WINNER
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: Ive found this tablet to be one of the best I have ever used even compared to the latest iPad. Admittingly I am an Android fan but this tablet is by far the best I have used running the android OS. The screen is very clear. The processor being quad core makes the entire thing run very smoothly. Wifi performance works great for me although I saw some reviews of others having a problem with mine it wasnt the case. If your looking for a great deal on a performance tablet this is the one.

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: alfred myler
Reviews.Content: Met expectations. Good battery life. Was hoping for higher processing speed. Still pretty decent for price. I would recommend highly. .

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: D. Rapoza
Reviews.Content: Great tablet at a great price.  Just wish it came with a SDcard for more storage, I still need to go buy one.

Reviews.Title: TABLET
Reviews.Author: Mary E. Anderson
Reviews.Content: THIS WAS A CHRISTMAS GIFT.IT WAS AN EXCELLENT CHOICE.VERY EASY TO SET UP AND USE AND THE USER IS VERY INEXPERIENCED.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son who is a muscian.  He said it worked very much like his phone and was easy to use.  He uses it to keep lyrics and uses it at shows so the larger screen works well.  So far so good.  I was a little nervous about this purchase because I was not farmilar with this brand but it has worked well.  Picks up WI-FI great.

Reviews.Title: Powerful tablet, amazing price point. Super long battery!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Michelle
Reviews.Content: Ive used quite a few tablets and this one is not only one of the best overall its also very inexpensive. It’s the best deal I was able to find with these specs. If you don’t know the difference in the chips used with these tablets I have to say the Allwinner a31 that is in this is a real powerhouse. Its great for 4K videos (I have a small collection of these now). Streams them right from my network drive no problems. The screen is very vivid and is better than my Google tablets. Overall this is a super deal. Highly recommended if youre looking for a cheap and powerful larger tablet.

Reviews.Title: Thanks Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: Valer Marin Pop
Reviews.Content: Good product for the price I payd just the battery is not what I expected from the previous reviews and specs.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This tablet exceeded my expectations.  It is very fast and smoothly transitions from one application to the next. Was charged when I took it out of the box and was easy to get started.  Battery life is decent.  I use it to watch movies, listen to music, surf web, games, email, etc.  The only thing I can find wrong is the camera doesn't take the best pictures, but I didn't buy it for that anyway so not a big deal to me. When comparing it to my friends IPad I really can't see a difference except for the price.  I love this tablet so much I just ordered two more, one for my son and the other for my fiance.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: William Anderson
Reviews.Content: Volume is low even on high, arrived with a bruise on the screen. Otherwise, it does what the more expensive ones does. Excellent battery life! I'm keeping it.

Reviews.Title: Can't open the tab.
Reviews.Author: Melisa
Reviews.Content: I bought the matricom tab android last month and I sent it to my mom. The problem is I can't remember my password to open the tab. my sister already resit the tab still they can't open. is there any other way to open the tab? any opinion is  appreciated. thanks

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Nanette
Reviews.Content: I ordered this when there was only a few reviews on it, but I thought that I would take the plunge and order it and find out for myself, and I'm glad I did.  I am not into the fruit craze, or paying for another tablet in that price range.  This tablet performs fast, the clarity is great also.  Definitely worth getting this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet! It's got all the bells and whistles at nearly half the cost of some other tablets. It's light weight and extremely easy to use. I would buy this tablet again in an instant!

Reviews.Title: pretty good tablet
Reviews.Author: lori
Reviews.Content: I really like. Its my first tablet. battery lasts about 6 hours. Once I installed avast (which was a headache) it does drain the battery some. does have a tendency to blow up pages when your not intending to. And the camera is not good quality. But overall its a pretty good tablet.Very easy to use! And surfs quick!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: anneka luna
Reviews.Content: Great product, runs fast and easy to use and setup.  There is a small shaded circle on the right side of the screen about the size of a quarter that always stays shaded.  At first I thought it may have been a smudge but it isn't and appears to be a lighting problem, etc.  Also, I paid 197.00 for product and the price has went down to 179.00.  When I emailed Matricom about the price difference before it was shipped I asked if they could throw in a screen saver, etc to make up for the price difference that happened over night and did not hear back.  I am not sure if I will deal with the shaded screen area or trade it for another one?

Reviews.Title: I give it a 4.
Reviews.Author: suznne rockstead
Reviews.Content: I really love this tablet as is fast, easy, and fun to use.  However, we are presently in Mexico and cannot access the Internet.  A page should come up w/ google whereby we enter a hotel code.  So far, no page.

Reviews.Title: So far so good, but minor issues.
Reviews.Author: citizen8700 "Man, Myth, Legend"
Reviews.Content: My first Tablet...  i got two issues.  This tablet's wi-fi doesn't pick up as good as my laptop that i got it to replace for web browsing. Also I am worried that the charging port is not a standard micro USB. i am worried about finding additional chargers as i always loose these things.

Reviews.Title: Awesome bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: Evolutionarytheory
Reviews.Content: I won't say much more right now other then I love the tablet. I've only been using it a couple days and everything I use it for has been flawless. Why 4 stars you say? Unfortunately I just now found out the headphone port is defective on my unit. Every pair of headphones I plug in are distorted and sound like I'm underwater, most likely due to faulty connector inside the port. I contacted the manufacturer, I hope this isn't going to turn into a huge debacle. Fingers crossed.

Reviews.Title: great alternate market tablet.
Reviews.Author: dean hall
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this tablet. its fast with a great screen. only complaint would be the lack of volume from speaker.

Reviews.Title: Two weeks in... loving it
Reviews.Author: Steve Boardman
Reviews.Content: ProsNice screenThinLightFastConsSpeakers do not get that loudCharger connection poorCost effectiveness warrants 5 stars imo

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Derrick Harvey
Reviews.Content: everything that was said about the tablet was all true.i'am glad that i made this purchase for my daughter.now it's time for my son.

Reviews.Title: worked great for 4 days
Reviews.Author: Jamaliz99
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this tablet for me as a gift because the majority of the reviews were really good. It worked for 4 days and then I tried to turn it on tonight and... nothing. It wouldn't boot past the android screen. I tried resetting it and holding the power button down, like the manual says to do but it didn't help. What a waste of money!

Reviews.Title: Not as Expected
Reviews.Author: Debra Pope
Reviews.Content: The seller sent it to me very fast and it was brand new and ready to use, it just was slow and not very user friendly. I tried it for 1 - 2 weeks but did return it. I had no issues with the seller, just the product itself.

Reviews.Title: Essentially DOA
Reviews.Author: G. Whitford "Grey Ghost"
Reviews.Content: This item had 4 out of 5 stars rating when I ordered it.  That is why I chose it instead of another tablet.  If I could I would give it 0 stars.Pro's:It arrived in a timely manner.It was well packagedThat's all folksCons:After charging, it took over 2 minutes of pressing the on button before anything happened.According to the instructions, the next step was to hit 'enter'.Since no OS ever showed it was impossible to hit anything.After trying the procedure 4 times, it was repackaged and a refund requested.  I didn't even get the chance to see if it connected to wifi.  This is the only item I have ever returned to Amazon.I waited over a year, researching inexpensive tablets, before choosing this item ( with a 4 star rating). I have to say that I am sorely disappointed, I was looking forward to learning a new system (android), as I cannot see well enough to use a smartphone for any length of time..  I will not be looking for another tablet until or unless these things have been perfected and offered for a reasonable price.  My laptop, though bulkier and heavier, will have to suffice.I DO NOT RECOMMEND!Update 3/18/14:  I see that Amazon no longer offers the item from their warehouse.  Too many returns? The price has gone up and an additional $10. in shipping has been added.BUYER BEWARE!

Reviews.Title: Not powering on!
Reviews.Author: JD Realtor®
Reviews.Content: I just got it in the mail and the tablet itself was pulled apart and not tightly sealed even if it was in it's new package and it could not power on. So of course I plugged it in to charge but it never came on nor was there any lights or indicator that it was charging so I have no choice but to return it! But, it's nice and big thou and I really wised it worked and it looks just like an IPad.

Reviews.Title: Didn't come on
Reviews.Author: Leese
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item with the help of my son and I am disappointed to say that I tried to charge this Tablet but am not getting anything on screen. It was to be a birthday present for someone but I am sending it back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: memory problem
Reviews.Author: Emily H.
Reviews.Content: So I got this the other day.not really any problems with it until I downloaded all myfav games and apps, after I did that I transfered everything to my 32gb SD card to make sure I had plenty of room for whatever else.. Well I tried to take a picture and it won't let me cuz it says I don't have enough room.. Checked my SD card and it says its still 100% Open space... But the tablet says otherwise... Wtf do I do nowSo I got this the other day.not really any problems with it until I downloaded all myfav games and apps, after I did that I transfered everything to my 32gb SD card to make sure I had plenty of room for whatever else.. Well I tried to take a picture and it won't let me cuz it says I don't have enough room.. Checked my SD card and it says its still 100% Open space... But the tablet says otherwise... Wtf do I do now

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: awesome tablet.... meets all my needs in a tablet.... very pleased with the product. You will be happy with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: CPU speed not as advertised
Reviews.Author: L. Lopez
Reviews.Content: is advertised as 1.5ghz. Tablet is showing max CPU speed as 1.2 GHz...screen is fairly crisp, I can see some faint lines on white screens though. Some faster content and scrolling shows faint ghosting as well, nothing to get fussed about I guess. But definitely false advertising in regard to the processor.Response from customer support :"The processor is capable of 1500mhz but it's set to 1200mpz for stability and extended battery life. Also, to prevent the Quantum from producing excessive heat and therefor damaging the product."So the tab really isn't running at 1.5ghz and if you try to overclock it crashes immediately. Not OK and not worth the new $299 price tag at all. Not when you can get a quality smooth running tablet for a little more money.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this POS
Reviews.Author: aroze
Reviews.Content: After looking and reading a lot of reviews I decided to buy this tablet as a gift, well right out of the box the screen was slow to react just to unlock and was unresponsive to touch, its a piece of crap

Reviews.Title: not worth the headache...
Reviews.Author: festermonkey
Reviews.Content: would always reset every other weeki'm very tech savvy,tried reset, restore, clean wipe and so on... Kept dumping all programs and within 2 months it wont even start the launcher. Their support team is not helpful you only get 30 days to make sure it works, i didn't know that till after it died. There are no updates for it. ended up buying a real tab instead of this $150+ light up paper weight.

Reviews.Title: great frustration
Reviews.Author: Rafael L.
Reviews.Content: Great expectations after receiving this device, I took the unpleasant surprise that the same could not ignite rightest way, I managed to contact for service and the right solution for them only managed to worsen the situation (the device does not turn on now) , and tell me that I must return to the source to repair.Please do not buy this unit if you live outside the United States.regards

Reviews.Title: Not very much to comment...
Reviews.Author: Mighty
Reviews.Content: I turn it on and off roughly 2 times daily, I don't use it on weekends. I charge the battery every 2 days. No gaming involved. Last for a week. Boom... all of sudden black screened. Can't power on, can't get into the storage to delete the logins. Try reset and not working.

Reviews.Title: The screen is defective
Reviews.Author: DUYGU E.
Reviews.Content: I bought and took it to my relatives in overseas. The screen was defective.  as I touch the screen it leaves a line, as if you have digital pen but as soon as I move my finger to touch another part of the screen the line goes away. we decided to keep it because my relative really needed a tablet and i wouldn't be able to bring back to US and exchange. All other features work fine. Time to time internet would be very slow, first we though it was the internet provider,  but once we checked at the same time with ipad, found that ipad was opening the screens alot faster than this tablet. So i can say it has internet connection problems time time. We tested skype that works fine. Over all i would recommend this product for it is price.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfy
Reviews.Author: Jawues Elie
Reviews.Content: I ordered the G-Tab with 8 meg and it came only with 4 meg and there is no IR Blaster future therefore i put it somewhere in the garage.

Reviews.Title: Too soon to tell.
Reviews.Author: Larry B
Reviews.Content: Still too soon to make a good report.  As I am still learning how it wants me to do tasks, in about a year, I will be able to critique a lot better.  Understand, I am computer literate enough to get into deep serious trouble!

Reviews.Title: Chinese manufacturer seemed to miss the obvious as they made this knock off
Reviews.Author: Home Inspector "Home Inspector"
Reviews.Content: This tablet has had me nearly tossing it against the wall in 5 days since I've had it .The Chinese are famous for reverse engineering and creating exact duplicates ofsome of the world's most renowned items such as rolex watches, Cameras, audiophones etc..Why they can't seem to match the dimensions of the most popular Samsung Tabletso these damn things will have some cases, armor protection, etc...available to themis utterly ridiculous.I've now ordered two different protective cases for this thing off amazon and neitherwill fit.Try and find anything on the web who even mentions this manufacturer and protectivecase, you won't find anything.It's sleek, slippery and you need a case to even consider using it .good luck..They made it just a bit too large to fit into any of them...Samsung Tab 1 2 or 3....my screen also came with 6 defects in it that resemble lil air bubbles under the screen.I'm using it for running software and in home inspections so I'm not worried about a fewdefects , but buyer beware for you picky types out there, this alone would have youmad.I just want a darn case that fits it !  nobody makes one for this oddball tablet !Not impressed! spend the extra coin and get the Samsung!

Reviews.Title: sleep of death
Reviews.Author: jojackson
Reviews.Content: had this tablet for two days then went to use it and the power wont turn on im returning this pick of crap it seems to be something with the battery called the sleep of death lame lame lame wont be buying anything running android again.

ProductInfo.Features:
The new Quad Core G-Tab Quantum featuring the latest 2014 powerful and robust A31 Allwinner Quad Core CPU with a top frequency of 1.5GHz x 4 cores pushes Android to the next level for an incredble gaming and multimedia experience. New "Quick Boot" technology starts your tablet in just seconds. Advanced core power-saving features provides extra long battery life without sacrificing performance.
The HD+ High Resolution IPS multi-touch 10.1" display technology features a crisp, clean and sharp 1280x800 High Definition display that is visible from virtually any angle. The Quantum's advanced screen technology provides beautiful, rich deep colors and fast motion videos come to life with the new UltraScan IPS high-speed switching display technology.
The high resolution Dual Camera design lets you snap pictures and take video that's happening in the real world. The rear 2.0 Megapixel camera is useful for capturing pictures and live action. Front .3MP camera is perfect for video chatting. An integrated Mini HDMI allows you to connect your tablet to your television to share with the entire family.
802.11 b/g/n integrated wireless keeps you connected on the go. Stay in touch with your friends and family, download your favorite apps, video chat with your loved ones. Stream video and music from your favorite websites with ease. Runs on the latest Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean OS which brings tons of new features to your G-Tab Quantum. Install all of your favorite apps from the Google Play Store (included) with the ability to load apps from SD. 8GB Total Storage (After Android OS and APK allocation storage leaves approx. 5GB user file storage)
Full 1 YEAR defect warranty! You're covered from any manufacturing defects for 1 year from the puchase of your G-Tab Quantum. So don't worry, you're covered! Looking for accidental drop, spill or extended coverage? Add the SquareTrade to fully protect your investment.
ProductInfo.Name: Matricom® G-Tab Quantum 10 Android 4.2 HD+ IPS Quad Core Tablet PC (10.1-Inch IPS, WiFi, Bluetooth)
